title: Calories in an In-N-Out Burger
meta_description: Discover in and out burger calories, including full nutrition breakdown for one hamburger, macros, and customization tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out hamburger: fresh beef patty, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no cheese or custom add-ons.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, portion size, and customizations. Check In-N-Out's official site or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out burger contains 390 calories with 16 g protein and 39 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, mustard, grilled onions)
Protein style (wrapped in lettuce, no bun)

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: A standard In-N-Out hamburger has 390 calories.

faqs.q: What are the macros for In-N-Out burger calories?
faqs.a: 39 g carbs, 19 g fat, 16 g protein per burger.

faqs.q: Does In-N-Out burger have trans fat?
faqs.a: About 1 g trans fat per burger from the beef and spread.

faqs.q: How much sodium in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Approximately 730 mg sodium per standard burger.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out burger calories for the double?
faqs.a: No, this is for a single patty hamburger; double-double adds about 200 more calories.
